DOC.brief_summary: Single center, open label crossover study with 2 treatment phases in healthy volunteers. The potential of phenotypic drug probes to predict drug-drug interactions between tacrolimus, voriconazole and rifampin will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Phenotypic Drug Probes as Predictors of Drug-drug Interactions With Tacrolimus
DOC.criteria: Male Age over 18 years Written informed consent Female Medical comorbidities Use of concomitant medication
